pkgmetadata.longdescription: Bayesian Model for CACE Analysis // Performs Complier Average Causal Effect analysis on either a single study or meta- analysis of datasets with binary outcomes using the Bayesian methods proposed in Zhou et al. (2019) doi:10.1111/biom.13028 and Zhou et al. (2021) doi:10.1080/01621459.2021.1900859.
